Articles.Content: Hello, I have made an SSTO with a lot of RAPIERs and there is too much particles and I have only 1 or 2 fps, there is a mod to fix the problem or another thing ?
If you zoom out enough, your FPS will go up significantly.

The biggest framerate-killer for me is the Aerodynamic FX Quality. I always set mine to the minimum setting.

The smoke trails might also be slowing you down. There's a way to delete those effects, but I don't know what it is.
Your question has been moved to the support subforum, and good luck with your issue.
